p.s: The Blogpostblogpost Globalised Environmental Pollution - Causes and Effects is written by Ankita Mitra.
It is published on her Blog on Environment in February 5th, 2014.
The Blogpostblogpost is about the pollution of our environment.
Ankita Mitra points out the hazardous effects on the natural world and the activities of living beings.
How we pollute our own and only world is also an important message in the Postpost.
The urbanization, the industrial growth are also things that contaminate our world.
But the Postpost isn't only about pollution it is also about what we could do against the contamination.
If we do nothing against it today, it is maybe too late tomorrow.
This Postpost is a message to the people on earth.
The message saissays that we have to regulate our industrial growth and urbanization, we have to do sth.something.
